testcase.classname: F01_Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When Entering username"Ayah" and Lastname"Hedya"and Email "yoyohedia7@gmail.com".passed And Enter"P@ssw0rd"as Password and its confirmation.........................passed And Click on Register button................................................passed Then Display the registration success message...............................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could login with registered account using email and password
testcase.name: users could login with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When Entering registered email "yoyohedia6@gmail.com"and Password "P@ssw0rd".passed And click on the login Button...............................................passed Then refer to the page and My account appears on the left top of the page...passed

testcase.system-out: Given click on the left top tab on the page.................................passed When select the needed currency"Euro".......................................passed Then check the selected currency reflected in the shown products............passed

testcase.classname: F06_Homeslider | user click on the slider ,slider shall refer to another link
testcase.name: user click on the slider nokia ,slider shall refer to another link

failure.message: Clicking on nokia slider doesn't refer probably as expected expected [true] but found [false]

testcase.failure:
When click on the slider"nokia".............................................passed Then check the current url after"nokia"slider...............................failed
